website_summaries.verdict: A premium hand file set for professionals and do-it-yourselfers alike.
pros: Consists of carbon steel that is tempered and hardened to ensure long-lasting quality
Precision-milled Double Cut teeth make the files excellent options for wood and metal projects
Rubber handle grips allow you to maintain a firm grip on each tool
Comes in a handy plastic toolbox for convenient storage and transport
cons: Not designed for vigorous sanding or other heavy-duty projects
Toolbox sometimes can be difficult to close

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CASE BUT FILES SEEM GOOD
customer_reviews.text: CHEAP CASE BUT FILES SEEM GOOD. ONE IS SLIGHTLY LOOSE FROM HANDLE. CASE IS VERY FRAGILE, MINE ARRIVED BUSTED AND WILL NOT CLOSE. JUST TOOK THE FILES OUT AND TOSSED THE CASE.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN K DAVIDSON

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They feel pretty cheaply made but overall they worked for what I needed them for. The case is really flimsy. If you’re using them for a small job then it’s worth it but I wouldn’t recommend them for long or heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: N@T

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These files do what they're designed to do. For those who have said the files broke it's important to realize that longevity comes with letting the tool do the work. Don't overdo when using them and they will do the job and last.
customer_reviews.author: ericc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A good set of files....they have kind of a medium grit, but work well. The handles are comfortable and I feel that once these files get broken in, they'll be great. Out of the box there are some burrs on the edges and such, but for the price and overall value, this is a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Solid File Set
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I've used these to aid with some basic needs and they work well. The handles provide good grip and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these when I was right in the middle of a project, making a patio table that I carved flying pigs & inlayed them in cedar, they worked perfectly for the small curves & finish work. I love the grip. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: beth53

customer_reviews.title: Great files, great price (crappy tray)
customer_reviews.text: Great so far, I don't like the cheap action figure plastic tray that comes with it. Would like to see a better tray for the 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good assortment and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of files! Perfectly placed in a great organized box. As I like to keep all my tools together and clean this is perfect hiwe we, I do wish they would put a little more effort into the functionality and durability of the box. It may not last as long as the tools do.
customer_reviews.author: MrGessner

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of rasps for woodworking. I did manage to snap the tip off one of the small ones, but that was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: C. Scott Crider

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of Files!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Well packaged and a excellent set of files received! Thank you for making them available!
customer_reviews.author: Clark A. Lucas II

customer_reviews.title: I scored BIG "best wife" point with this set...
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES them. So much he wants to buy a 2nd set in case there's a zombie apocalypse and he forgets to pack 'em. They're durable, easy to use, arrive quickly and maintain their edges very well
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great files
customer_reviews.text: Perfect files for coping when you just want it to be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a blacksmith/bladesmith and I bought these for use in my shop. I have to say I could not be happier with the quality of this product and will be ordering more bulwark tools in the future! Do you guys have a catalog?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Fixed molding in a 100 years old house. Worked great. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carbon Steel Carpenter File Kit
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use them yet but they do seem to be as stated and look to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry and Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set, very convenient to bring to sites and store
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The set is amazing for the price. Been using all arou d the house for random projects.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Step

customer_reviews.title: All you need for small hobbies
customer_reviews.text: Nice file set. Just keep the brushed out an they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could just leave a 5-Star review and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: LJRossPhoto

customer_reviews.title: so I’m satisfied with the product as well as the speed of ...
customer_reviews.text: File set only used briefly with impressive results, so I’m satisfied with the product as well as the speed of response for my order.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Osinski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Would have liked a set with more files, more variety.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set
customer_reviews.text: Great product and outstanding communication from the manufacturer. Consistent follow up and verification of my satisfaction. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Product showed up on time and as advertised. Files ...
customer_reviews.text: Product showed up on time and as advertised. Files. To be high quality steel and handles are well attached. Cannot speak about long-term durability however I believe that by all appearances they will stand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McBride

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice file set and at a good price with free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools.
customer_reviews.text: Just got the set and I have only used the large flat bastard to sharpen limb cutters, but I am very impressed with the quality and the case is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Bjork Pie Hat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet, but just what I need when I do.
customer_reviews.author: William H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great file set. Definitely will not be the last set of files I will get in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and does the job! Shipped very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for just handy work around the home shop
customer_reviews.text: As advertised!!!! Great pack for just handy work around the home shop.
customer_reviews.author: Owen E. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The tools worked great on my woodworking projects. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Wang

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality product
customer_reviews.text: The set was better than I expected very very pleased with the quality . Have already used it to help make the ND logo for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shapcott

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and I have used them.... very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for hand made jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I use all the files for my metal jewelry that I make at home and school. They are very sturdy and clean up well with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gregson

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made files, work great and Handel's are solid and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: For light or finish work only, these are fine.
customer_reviews.text: Grip is good. These tools are fine for finish work, give a nice smooth finish on wood. They are not useful for more vigorous sanding, say if you need to sand down a lot of rough edges. For that, I would go for something with higher ridges. The smaller tools included in the kit are probably for crafts or hobbies, and should be handled with care. I tried to use one of them on a real project and bent it right away. Overall, these were not expensive and the quality matches. I will have to buy additional tools to do more serious work. But if you just need basic tools for light finishing, these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: sandyb

customer_reviews.title: Durability issue
customer_reviews.text: One of the files broke after about 5 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for filing metal miniatures
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of files. I bought these for smoothing edges on metal miniatures. This set is fantastic and has a size for all my needs. They are very durable and easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: like them because of the different types of sizes and shapes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MulWark 9pcs Premium Grade Tempered High Carbon Steel Carpenter File Set with Flat, Round Rasp, Half Round Flat & Mini Needle Files-Idea Files to Shape, Sharpen, De-burr Hobby Model, Soft Metal & Wood
feature_bullets: ▲PREMIUM GRADE - The files are made of hardened & tempered carbon steel with a hardness of 62HRC. The ergonomic handles are made of sturdy ABS and soft rubber with concave & contoured design, ensuring excellent impact resistance, comfort & easy grip

▲THE 9 PIECES SET - The set includes 3pcs 8” engineer files of round, flat, half-round shape and 6pcs 4” fine needle files of square, round taper, equaling, ring, warding, triangular shape. The kit is stored in a well-constructed plastic toolbox

▲SUPERB VERSATILITY - The different shapes of files make a perfect combination for various application of sharpening, shaping and deburring hobby models, jewelry, clocks, watches, wood, metals, polymers, etc., for both course works or detail projects. A great tool set for DIY woodworkers

▲EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE - The precision milled second-cut/ double cut teeth removes fine amounts of material from a workpiece. The set works great at woodworking and metalworking projects (axe file), e.g. on aluminum, tin, iron, copper. etc.

▲LIFETIME WARRANTY - All MulWark tools are warranted to be free of defects in materials and workmanship for as long as you own the product, you may return this product free of charge with original purchase receipt or choose to get a replacement

specifications.Shape: Flat, round, half round, warding, square, triangle
specifications.Special Features: Extra strong, Comfortable constructed handle, Solid case for organization
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
